name: SmallheartStudios_MaskOn
description:
WASD to move, left mouse button to grab toilet paper, space to dash! Bash into other players using Steam multiplayer (must be signed into Steam to connect) and stop them from getting more TP than you! It's been a long pandemic, but play your cards right, and you can set yourself up with enough TP for the coming months!

Some audio files courtesy of freesounds.org.
